assignment_title: Turing Chain: Chained Translation and Vector Error Assessment
project_goal: Validate translation quality by measuring the accumulated vector distance in a three-step translation chain (Turing Machine concept).

requirements.description: Sentence length must be between 10 and 20 words.

components.description: Build three sequential LLM Agents for the translation chain.

requirements.description: Implement a method to convert both the Original English and Re-Translated English text into vectors (Embeddings/Tokens).
Measure the vector distance (error) between each Original Sentence and its corresponding Re-Translated Sentence.
Use **Cosine Distance** (or Cosine Similarity) as the metric for vector distance.

advanced_challenges: Introduce intentional spelling errors into the original English sentences to test the system's sensitivity (Optional).
